docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

methods.name: show

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

examples:
GET /api/provisioning_templates/1007981701-centos5_3_pxelinux
200
{
  "template": "default linux~label linux~kernel <%= @kernel %>~append initrd=<%= @initrd %> ks=<%= foreman_url(\"kickstart\")%> ksdevice=bootif network kssendmac",
